mapper.select: SELECT S.S_CODE, S.B_CODE, S.ACC_NAME, S.ACC_BANK, S.ACC_NO, S.S_POSTCODE, S.S_ADDR, S.S_DETAIL, S.S_ENTDATE, S.S_CHK, S.S_OUT, S.S_OUT_DATE FROM SELLER S WHERE S.S_CODE = #{sCode}

SELECT B_Code AS bCode, B_Ct_Code AS bCtCode, B_Id AS bId, B_Pw AS bPw, B_Name AS bName, B_Phone AS bPhone, B_Email AS bEmail, Ad_Sms AS adSms, Ad_Email AS adEmail FROM Buyer
AND B_Id = #{bId }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO upcy_review (UPCY_CODE, B_CODE, PRD_CODE, UPCY_CONTENT, UPCY_GRADE, UPCY_DATE) VALUES ('UPCY' || lpad(UPCY_RVW_SEQ.nextval, 7, '0'), #{bCode}, #{prdCode}, #{upcyContent}, #{upcyGrade}, SYSDATE)
